item.title: CVE-2022-36373|2024-09-17T01:36:15.451Z -- simon%20ward -- mp3-jplayer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Simon Ward MP3 jPlayer plugin <= 2.7.3 at WordPress.
